T11bsa064_u:8: iṣṭasyārthasya siddhiḥ sādhanam. tasya nirvartakam aṅgam. tasya avacanaṃ tasyāṅgasyānuccāraṇaṃ vādino nigrahādhikaraṇam:
T11bsa064_u:16: tasya samarthanaṃ sādhyena vyāptiṃ prasādhya dharmiṇi bhāvasādhanam /
T11bsa064_u:23: yasmād dharmiṇi prāk sattvaṃ prasādhya paścādapi vyāptiḥ prasādhyata eva /
T11bsa064_u:29: yadi na sarvaṃ sat kṛtakaṃ vā pratikṣaṇavināśi syād,
T11bsa064_u:30: akṣaṇikasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāyogād arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇamato vyāvṛttam - ityasadeva syāt /
T11bsa064_u:32: evaṃ sādhanasya sādhyaviparyaye bādhakapramāṇānupadarśane virodhābhāvādasya viparyayavṛtteradarśane san kṛtako vā syāt,
T11bsa064_u:47: evaṃ hi sa hetuḥ sādhyābhāve 'san sidhyet,
T11bsa064_u:56: yatra kramayaugapadyāyogo na tasya kvacit sāmarthyam /
T11bsa064_u:60: tāvatā sādhanadharmamātrānvayaḥ sādhyadharmasya svabhāvahetulakṣaṇaṃ ca siddhaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:72: 'satsvapi tadanyeṣu samartheṣu taddhetuṣu tadabhāve na bhavati'; iti /
T11bsa064_u:80: mātṛvivāho hi tddeśajanmanaḥ piṇḍakharjūrasya deśāntareṣu mātṛvivāhābhāve 'bhāvavat /
T11bsa064_u:81: evaṃ hi samarthitaṃ tat kāryaṃ sidhyati /
T11bsa064_u:84: avyabhicāre ca svakāraṇaiḥ sarvakāryāṇāṃ sadṛśo nyāyaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:86: evamasamarthanaṃ kāryahetāvapi sādhanāṅgāvacanaṃ tad vādinaḥ parājayasthānam /
T11bsa064_u:87: asamarthite tasmin kāryatvāsiddherarthāntarasya tadbhāvāpratibaddhasvabhāvasya bhāve tadbhāvaniyamābhāvāt,
T11bsa064_u:112: 12. buddhivyapadeśārthakriyābhyaḥ sadvyavahāro viparyaye cāsadvyavahāra iti cet /
T11bsa064_u:115: pratyakṣāviṣaye tu syālliṅgajāyā api kutaścit sadvyavahāraḥ /
T11bsa064_u:117: viprakṛṣṭe 'rthe pratipattṛpratyakṣasya anyasya vā pramāṇasya nivṛttāvapi saṃśayāt /
T11bsa064_u:118: 13. na ca sarve buddhivyapadeśāstadbhedābhedau vā vastusattāṃ vastubhedābhedasattāṃ vā sādhayanti,
T11bsa064_u:119: astsvapi kathañcidatītānāgatādiṣu nānaikārthakriyākāriṣu vārtheṣu tadbhāvakhyāpanāya nānaikātmatābhāve 'pinānaikarūpāṇāṃ vṛtteḥ - rājā mahāsammataḥ (Vn 15)
T11bsa064_u:129: sa yaiḥ śaktibhedairanekasambandhina mupakaroti tairevānekaṃ śabdaṃ kiṃ notthāpayati /
T11bsa064_u:133: anupakāre hi teṣāṃ tatsambandhitāpi na sidhyati /
T11bsa064_u:134: ghaṭa ityapi ca rūpādaya eva bahava ekārthakriyākāriṇa ekaśabdavācyā bhavantu,
T11bsa064_u:141: tatra ye 'rthāḥ saha pṛthagvā ekaprayojanāḥ teṣāṃ tadbhāvakhyāpanāya hi ekśabdo niyujyeta yadi, kiṃ syāt?
T11bsa064_u:145: samudāyaśabda ekasmin samudāye vācye ekavacanaṃ ghaṭa iti /
T11bsa064_u:146: jātiśabdeṣvarthānāṃ pratyekaṃ sahitānāṃ ca śaktirnānaikā ca śaktiriti,
T11bsa064_u:151: asmākaṃ tu sāṅketikeṣvartheṣu saṅketavaśāt tāvitya bhiniveśa eva /
T11bsa064_u:161: api ca - yadi na rūpādīnāmekena śabdena sambandhaḥ,
T11bsa064_u:162: kathamekenaiṣā - māśrayābhimatena dravyeṇa sambandha iti kevalamayamasadbhūtābhiniveśa eva /
T11bsa064_u:165: api tvabhinnānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ ghaṭakambalādiṣu nānārthakriyāśabdavirodhāt te ekarūpāḥ samudāyāntarā - sambhāvinīmarthakriyāmeva na kuryuḥ,
T11bsa064_u:167: bhavatu nāma kasyacidiyaṃ vāñchā - bhaveyurekarūpā rūpādayaḥ sarvasamudāyeṣu iti /
T11bsa064_u:172: 17. yadyanya eva rūpādibhyo ghaṭaḥ syāt kiṃ syāt?
T11bsa064_u:173: astu, tasya pratyakṣasya sato 'rūpādirūpasya tadvivekena buddhau svarūpeṇa pratibhāsane kimāvaraṇam?
T11bsa064_u:176: idameva ca pratyakṣasya pratyakṣatvaṃ yadanātmarūpādivivekena svarūpasya buddhau samarpaṇam /
T11bsa064_u:177: ayaṃ punarghaṭādiramūlyadānakrayī yaḥ svarūpaṃ ca nopadarśayati,
T11bsa064_u:184: tanna rūpādibhyo 'nyo ghaṭaḥ evaṃ tāvanna buddhivyapadeśābhyāṃ sattāvyavahāraḥ,
T11bsa064_u:194: yā arthakriyā yasminnadṛṣṭā punardṛśyate sā sattābhedaṃ sādhayati /
T11bsa064_u:196: adṛṣṭā ca tantuṣu prāvaraṇādyarthakriyā paṭe dṛsyate iti sattābhedaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:208: sa eva tu viparyayo 'nupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣu na sidhyati /
T11bsa064_u:216: so 'nyatrāpi tathāvidhe 'viśiṣṭa iti so 'pi tathāstu iti /
T11bsa064_u:221: 21. naiva kaścit kvacit kathañcidanupalabdho 'pyasadvyavahāraviṣaya iti cet /
T11bsa064_u:222: sarvasya sarvarūpāṇāṃ sarvadānivṛtteḥ sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā samupayujyeta /
T11bsa064_u:230: kasyacidapi rūpasya kathañcit kvacit kadācid viviktahetorabhāvāt /
T11bsa064_u:236: kvacid viṣaye 'sadvyavahāropagame sa kuta iti vaktavyam /
T11bsa064_u:246: sukumāraprajño devānāmpriyo na sahate pramāṇacintā - parikleśaṃ,
T11bsa064_u:252: tasmāt svabhāvaviśeṣo yataḥ pramāṇānniyamen sadvyavahāraṃ pratipadyate,
T11bsa064_u:259: api ca - kuta idamamantrauṣadhamindrajānaṃ bhāvena śikṣitam,
T11bsa064_u:273: sānvayatve ca kā kasya pravṛttirnivṛttirvā iti yatkiñcidetat /
T11bsa064_u:274: athavā yadi ca kasyacitsvabhāvasya pravṛttirnivṛttirveti svayamapyabhyanujñāyate,
T11bsa064_u:286: tā avasthāḥ sā ca śaktiḥ kimeko bhavaḥ?
T11bsa064_u:288: ekaścet kathamidānīmidamekatrāvibhaktātmani niṣparyāyaṃ parasparavyāhataṃ yokṣyate - janmājanma,
T11bsa064_u:297: śaktiravasthetyeko bhāvo 'vibhāga iti yat ko 'yaṃ virodha uktaḥ?
T11bsa064_u:300: kevalaṃ sānvayau bhāvasya janmavināśau iti na syāt /
T11bsa064_u:305: anuttaraṃ bata doṣasaṅkaṭamatrabhavān dṛṣṭirāgeṇa pravesyamāno 'pi nātmānaṃ /
T11bsa064_u:310: sthitāvasthitiḥ ityādikaṃ nānātvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kathaṃ yotsyate?
T11bsa064_u:323: evaṃ hyasyāpi sukhādiṣu caitanyeṣu bhedāvagamaḥ samartho bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:329: na ca ghaṭaṃ mṛdātmānaṃ ca kaścid vivekenopalakṣayati,
T11bsa064_u:332: na ca śakteḥ śaktyātmani prādurbhāvaḥ iti tasyāḥ svātmano 'bhedo na syāt /
T11bsa064_u:335: yo 'pi hi kalpayed - 'yo yasya pariṇāmaḥ sa tasmādabhinnaḥ'; iti /
T11bsa064_u:337: kiñcedamuktaṃ bhavati - pariṇāma ityavasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttiḥ,
T11bsa064_u:346: na hi tadeva tasyānapāśritavyapekṣābhedaṃ dharmāntaraṃ bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:349: tadā tasya nivṛttiprādurbhāvābhyaṃ na dravyasya pariṇatiḥ /
T11bsa064_u:352: dravyasya dharma iti ca vyapadeśo na sidhyati,
T11bsa064_u:359: arthāntarasya kāryasyotpādanāt dravyasya pariṇāmaḥ itīṣṭaṃ syāt /
T11bsa064_u:361: pūrvakānmṛtpiṇḍadravyāt kāraṇāduttarasya ghaṭadravyasya kāryasyotpattau 'mṛd dravyaṃ pariṇatam';
T11bsa064_u:363: na ca dharmasya dravyāt tattvānyatvābhyāmanyo vikalpaḥ sambhavati,
T11bsa064_u:377: na hi prasāritā aṅgulyo nirvivekasvabhāvāḥ muṣṭyaṅgulyaḥ,
T11bsa064_u:386: na hi sato vastunastattvānyatve muktvā anyaḥ prakāraḥ sambhavati,
T11bsa064_u:388: aṅgulīṣu punaḥ pratikṣaṇavināśinīṣvanyā eva prasaritaḥ anyā muṣṭiḥ /
T11bsa064_u:398: nanu sarvatra sattve 'pyayaṃ tulyo doṣaḥ - na hi sattve kaścid viśeṣaḥ,
T11bsa064_u:399: viśeṣe vā sa viśeṣa straigunyād bhinnaḥ syāt,
T11bsa064_u:404: yasya kasyacidatiśayasya tatra kathañcidasata utpattau so 'tiśayastatra asan kathaṃ jāyeta?
T11bsa064_u:405: jāto vā sarvaḥ sarvasmājjāyeta iti tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:411: 28. na ca sarvathā sataḥ kaścijjanmārtha ityuktam /
T11bsa064_u:412: asato 'pi kāryasya kāraṇādutpāde yo yajjananasvabhāvastata eava tasya janma,
T11bsa064_u:419: tasyā eva tadarthakriyādibhāve ghatvāt tadrūpasya ca prāgasattvāt kathaṃ ghaṭo 'sti?
T11bsa064_u:430: tenānupalabdhyā kasyacid vyavacchedaṃ prasādhayatā tasya yathoktopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirūpatā darśanīyā /
T11bsa064_u:432: vyāpakānupalabdhāvapi dharmayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ prasādhya vyāpakasya nivṛttiprasādhanaṃ samarthanam /
T11bsa064_u:433: kāraṇānupalabdhāvapi kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ prasādhya kāraṇasya nivṛtti prasādhanaṃ samarthanam /
T11bsa064_u:441: 30. athavā - sādhyate yena pareṣāmapratīto 'rtha iti sādhanaṃ,
T11bsa064_u:449: athavā - tasyaiva sādhanasya yannāṅgaṃ pratijñopanayanigamanādi tasyāsādhanāṅgasya sādhanavākye upādānaṃ vādino nigrahasthānaṃ,
T11bsa064_u:451: anvayavyatirekavacanayorvā sādharmyavati vaidharmyavati ca sādhanaprayoga ekasyaivābhidhānena siddherbhāvād dvitīyasyāsāmarthyamiti tasyāpyasādhanāṅgasyābhidhānaṃ
T11bsa064_u:456: asatyapi pratijñāvacane yathoktāt sādhanavākyād bhavatyeveṣṭārthasiddhirityapārthakaṃ tasyopādānam /
T11bsa064_u:460: sa pratijñāvacane 'pi tulya iti kathaṃ na sādhanam?
T11bsa064_u:462: tattulyaṃ pakṣadharmavacanasyāpīti tadapi na sādhanāvayavaḥ syāt /
T11bsa064_u:467: tasmād vyarthameva sādhanavākye pratijñāvacanopādānaṃ vādino nigrasthānam /
T11bsa064_u:470: viruddhaḥ anaikāntiko vā hetvābhāsaḥ tasyāpi vacanaṃ vādino nigrahasthānam,
T11bsa064_u:475: na hi tairhetoḥ sambandhaḥ śakyate pradarśayitum /
T11bsa064_u:479: tadaṅgaṃ dharmo yasyārthasya vivādāśrayasya vādaprastāvahetoḥ sa sādhanāṅgaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:487: jijñāsitaṃ punararthasyānyasya prasaṅgaparaṃparayā ye ṣa pannādinā (?)
T11bsa064_u:491: na hi kaścidarthaḥ kvacit kriyamāṇaprasaṅge na prayujyate,
T11bsa064_u:502: iti prasaṅgaṃ kṛtvā 'nāndyante tataḥ praviśati sūtradhāraḥ'; iti paṭhet,
T11bsa064_u:504: prativādī taṃ ca sarvaprasaṅgaṃ nānukartuṃ samartha iti parājitaḥ syāt /
T11bsa064_u:507: 34. na caivaṃ prastutasya paryavasānaṃ sa bhavati [?
T11bsa064_u:528: na hi tasyāpi kācid vivakṣitasādhyadharmasiddhau nāntarīyakatā /
T11bsa064_u:531: tathāvidhastu dharmaḥ pṛthaganukto 'pi sādhyadharme 'ntarbhāvāt pakṣīkṛta eveti na pṛthagasyopanyāsaḥ,
T11bsa064_u:533: tasmādevaṃvidhasyāpi tadānīṃ prativādino jijñāsitasyārthasya pratijñāyāmanyatraivopanyāso vyākhyānaṃ vā arthāntaragamanānnigrahasthānameva /
T11bsa064_u:537: evamasādhanāṅgavacanaṃ vādino nigrahasthānaṃ prativādinā tathābhāve pratipādite,
T11bsa064_u:542: vādinā sādhane pratyukte 'bhyupagatottarapakṣo yatra viṣaye prativādī yadā na doṣamudbhāvayati,
T11bsa064_u:554: na hi duṣṭa sādhanābhidhāne 'pi vādinaḥ prativādino 'pratipādite doṣe parājayavyavasthāpanā yuktā,
T11bsa064_u:556: kevalaṃ hetvābhāsād bhūtapratipatterabhāvāda pratipādakasya jayo 'pi nāstyeva /
T11bsa064_u:574: nāpi tathāpravṛttebhyaḥ svahastadānena prāṇināmupatāpanaṃ satsammatānāṃ śāstrakāra sabhāsadāṃ yuktam /
T11bsa064_u:577: parānugrahapravṛttāstu santo vipratipannaṃ pratipādayanto nyāyamanusareyuḥ satsādhanābhidhānena,
T11bsa064_u:599: yathā sādhyatayāniṣṭo 'pi vādino dharmaḥ śāstropagamāt sādhya iti tadviparyāsena na virodhodbhāvanam /
T11bsa064_u:605: tasya vādinā doṣābhāsatve prakhyāpite prativādī parājito vaktavyaḥ,
T11bsa064_u:607: doṣavati punaḥ sādhane na dvayorekasyāpi jayaparājayau,
T11bsa064_u:610: apratipakṣāyāṃ ca pakṣasiddhau kṛtāyāṃ jetā bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:613: nirdoṣe sādhanābhidhāne 'pi vādinaḥ prativādinā doṣābhāsa udbhāvite dūṣaṇābhāvatvakhyāpane eva jayaparājayau,
T11bsa064_u:625: [nyā.sū. 5.2..2] ityatra bhāṣyakāramataṃ dūṣayitvā vārtikakāro yaṃ sthitapakṣamāha,
T11bsa064_u:626: tatraivaṃ brūmaḥ - pratidṛṣṭāntasya yo dharmastaṃ yadā svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānāti nigṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:627: tatra dṛṣṭaścāsāvante ca vyavasthita iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:632: iti bruvan pratipakṣavādini sāmānyena pratyavasthite āha - 'yadi sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo 'pyevamastu';
T11bsa064_u:636: 40. atropagatapratijñātyāgāt pratijñāhānau viśeṣapratiniyamaḥ kiṃkṛto 'nena prakāreṇa pratijñāṃ tyajataḥ pratijñāhāniriti /
T11bsa064_u:637: sambhavati hyanenāpi prakāreṇa hetudoṣodbhāvanādinā pratipakṣasādhanābhidhānena ca svapakṣaparityāgaḥ,
T11bsa064_u:645: iti kaḥ svasthātmāsvayamaindriyakatvādanityaḥ śabdo ghatavaditi bruvan sāmānyenopadarśanamātreṇa nityaṃ śabdaṃ pratipadyeta?
T11bsa064_u:646: sāmānyasyāpi nityasyaindriyakatve tasyānitye ghaṭe darśanāt saṃśayitaḥ syāt /
T11bsa064_u:651: na ca nityasāmānyopadarśanena taddharmaṃ śabde pratipadyamānena pratipakṣadharmo 'bhyanujñāto bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:653: iti ca vadato nityaśabda ityāñjasaḥ pratipakṣaḥ syāt, (Vn 68)
T11bsa064_u:660: tasya hetuvyabhicāropadarśanena pratiṣedhe kṛte dharmabhedavikalpāt sāmānyaghaṭayo
T11bsa064_u:673: 43. atrāpi naivaṃ bruvatā pratijñāntaraṃ pūrvapratijñāsādhanāyoktaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:675: aindriyakatvasya hetoḥ sāmānye vṛttyā vyabhicāra udbhāvite 'sarvagatatve satyaindriyakatvasyahetorviśeṣaṇopādāne vyābhicāraṃ pariharati,
T11bsa064_u:681: na hi pratijñā pratijñāsādhanāyocyamānā pratijñāntaraṃ bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:690: yo hi prāk pratijñāmuktvā hetūdāharaṇādikaṃ vaktuṃ jānāti,
T11bsa064_u:696: evaṃprakārāṇāmasambaddhānāṃ parisaṃkhyātumaśakyatvāt lakṣaṇaniyamo 'pyasambadaddha eva - pratijñāntarābhidhāne pratijñāntaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānamiti
T11bsa064_u:698: na caivaṃvidhaḥ kaścid vivādeṣu dṛṣṭapūrvo vyavahāro yena tadarthaṃ yatnaḥ kriyate /
T11bsa064_u:703: 45. dṛśyate ca viduṣāmapi nātinirūpaṇādasiddhābhidhānamiti vyavahāradarśanāt tādṛśaṃ parājayādhikaraṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T11bsa064_u:706: evaṃ yadi prativādī satsāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityaṃ ca pramāṇena pratipādayituṃ śaknuyāt anuddiśyāpramāṇakaṃ śāstropagamaṃ,
T11bsa064_u:737: yaṃ ca svapakṣānapekṣaṃ hetuṃ prayuṅkte - 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyakatvād'; iti,
T11bsa064_u:746: tadāśrayastatkṛto vā hetudṛśṭāntayorna virodha iti na pratijñāvirodho nāma kiñcinnigrahasthānam /
T11bsa064_u:747: syādetat / asatyapi pratijñāprayoge gamyamāno 'pi pratijñāhetvorvirodho bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:750: ityukte 'pi gamyata eva sādhyasādhanayorvirodhaḥ - kathaṃ tato 'rthāntarasyānupalabdhiḥ,
T11bsa064_u:764: vyatiriktānāmapi bhāvānāṃ kutaścid viprakarṣiṇāṃ tadvyatirekeṇānupalabdhāvapi vyatirekasya bhāvāt /
T11bsa064_u:777: ye tu kecid vicāraprasaṅgeṣu ekatra sādhye bahavo hetava ucyante, teṣa /
T11bsa064_u:780: yadi hi tatrāpyekaprayogamantareṇāparasya prayogo na sambhavet,
T11bsa064_u:797: anekārthasāmānyābhidhānaṃ ca pratipādya sarvasya śabdārthasya nānārtharūpatayaikavastuviśeṣasvabhāvatābhāvamupadarśayan śabdārthamadhikṛtya sarvaṃ pṛthagiti brūyāt /
T11bsa064_u:801: yathā kvacid arthe vipratipattau prasiddhamanekārthasāmānye śabdaprayogamupadarśya pratipāditavipratipattisthānaḥ sāmānyenopasaṃharati - sarvaṃ pṛthagiti /
T11bsa064_u:804: vipratipattiviṣayaśca kiṃ na darśita iti cet /
T11bsa064_u:809: na caikameva kiñcinnāstīti bruvāṇaḥ kaścit tatsamuccayarūpamekaṃ ca samūhamicchati,
T11bsa064_u:816: ataḥ so 'pi na samūhastasyeṣṭo na tatra śabda iti na virodhaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:821: iha pritijñayā hetorityasti bheda iti cet /
T11bsa064_u:828: 53. api cāyaṃ viruddho vā sati hetuprayoge vyadhikaraṇatvādasiddha ityasiddhatā hetornigrahasthānam /

T11bsa064_u:1416: so 'sthāne nirdoṣe nigrahasthānasya niyoktodbhāvayitā na bhavati tathā /
T11bsa064_u:1417: bhūtadoṣodbhāvanalakṣaṇasyottarasyā- pratipatteritareṇottarābhāsatve pratipādite 'pratibhayaiva nigṛhīta iti nedamato nigrahasthānāntaram /
T11bsa064_u:1419: tasya tena bhūtadoṣatve pratipādite sādhanābhāsavacanenaiva nigṛhīta iti /
T11bsa064_u:1421: avaśyaṃ hi viṣayāntaraprāptyarthaṃ hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvena vaktavyāḥ,
T11bsa064_u:1425: ” [nyā. sū. 5.2.24] kasyacidarthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayāt kathāprasaṅgaṃ kurvato 'pasiddhānto vijñeyaḥ /
T11bsa064_u:1428: iti siddhāntamabhyupetya pakṣamavasthāpayati - 'ekāntā prakṛtiḥ vyaktasya avyaktalakṣaṇā;
T11bsa064_u:1433: sa evamuktavān paryanuyujyate - atha prakṛtirvikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam?
T11bsa064_u:1434: yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ,
T11bsa064_u:1435: yat tad dharmāntaraṃ sa vikāra iti /
T11bsa064_u:1441: pravṛttirvā- ityevaṃ pratyavasthite yadi sa sata ātmahānamasataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti,
T11bsa064_u:1445: ito 'pi na kaścidaniyamāt kathāprasaṅgo yattenopagataṃ nāsadutpadyate na sadvinaśyati';
T11bsa064_u:1450: sukhādīnāmutpattivināśābhyupagamābhāvāt sarvasya tadātmakasya notpatti- vināśāviti siddhaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:1452: 91. atra taduktasya hetordoṣamanudbhāvya vikāraprakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchan svayamayaṃ prakṛtāsambandhena aniyamāt kathāṃ pravartayati /
T11bsa064_u:1453: tatredaṃ syād vācyaṃ - vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛttinivṛttidharmakaṃ,
T11bsa064_u:1459: evaṃ hi tasya sādhanadoṣodbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito bhavati /
T11bsa064_u:1464: na lokaḥ śabdairapratipāditamarthaṃ pratipattuṃ samartha iti,
T11bsa064_u:1468: ] kathāprasaṅgāt iti idamapi hetvābhāseṣvantarbhāvāt na pṛthagvācyam /
T11bsa064_u:1475: atrāpi yathoktatvāccintyemeva - kiṃ te yathā lakṣitaprabhedāstathaiva,
